title: Severe weather threat Sunday; Much colder next week | Video | kadn.com
text:
Severe weather threat Sunday; Much colder next week
- Updated
[0](https://www.kadn.com/video/severe-weather-threat-sunday-much-colder-next-week/video_2fb52987-478e-5e94-82bf-4b8cd8254068.html#comments)
It's been a rather seasonable day with plenty of clouds, but we're monitoring a storm system that has the potential to bring strong to severe weather to Acadiana on Sunday with much colder air arriving in the wake of that system.
